description: Basic element serializer mostly for returned values.

parent_element_id.description: The parent element, if inside a container.

styles.description: The theme overrides for this element

style_border_top_size.description: Pixel height of the top border.

style_padding_top.description: Padding size of the top border.

style_margin_top.description: Margin size of the top border.

style_border_bottom_size.description: Pixel height of the bottom border.

style_padding_bottom.description: Padding size of the bottom border.

style_margin_bottom.description: Margin size of the bottom border.

style_border_left_size.description: Pixel height of the left border.

style_padding_left.description: Padding size of the left border.

style_margin_left.description: Margin size of the left border.

style_border_right_size.description: Pixel height of the right border.

style_padding_right.description: Padding size of the right border.

style_margin_right.description: Margin size of the right border.

style_background.description:
What type of background the element should have.

* `none` - None
* `color` - Color
* `image` - Image

style_background_color.description: The background color if `style_background` is color.

style_background_mode.description:
The mode of the background image

* `tile` - Tile
* `fill` - Fill
* `fit` - Fit

style_width.description:
Indicates the width of the element.

* `full` - Full
* `full-width` - Full Width
* `normal` - Normal
* `medium` - Medium
* `small` - Small

roles.description: User roles associated with this element, used in conjunction with role_type.
